mapper.sql: id, asnnumber, pnnumber, pn_quantity, payment, ship_to, sold_to, order_type, exchange_provision_item, condition_item, remark, carrier, customer, net_due_date, po_date, delivery_date, drop_order_time, target_date, created_by, last_modified_by, flag
mapper.select: select mapper.ponumber as ponumber,asn.id as id,asn.asnnumber as asnnumber,asn.pnnumber as pnnumber, asn.pn_quantity as pnQuantity,asn.payment as payment,asn.ship_to as shipTo,asn.sold_to as soldTo, asn.order_type as orderType,asn.exchange_provision_item as exchangeProvisionItem, asn.condition_item as conditionItem,asn.remark as remark,asn.carrier as carrier, asn.customer as customer,asn.net_due_date as netDueDate,asn.po_date as poDate, asn.delivery_date as deliveryDate,asn.drop_order_time as dropOrderTime,asn.target_date as targetDate, asn.created_by as createdBy,asn.last_modified_by as lastModifiedBy,asn.flag as flag,flag.status as status from asn,flag,mapper where asn.flag = flag.flag and asn.pnnumber = mapper.pnnumber

select mapper.ponumber,asn.id as id,asn.asnnumber as asnnumber,asn.pnnumber as pnnumber, asn.pn_quantity as pnQuantity,asn.payment as payment,asn.ship_to as shipTo,asn.sold_to as soldTo, asn.order_type as orderType,asn.exchange_provision_item as exchangeProvisionItem, asn.condition_item as conditionItem,asn.remark as remark,asn.carrier as carrier, asn.customer as customer,asn.net_due_date as netDueDate,asn.po_date as poDate, asn.delivery_date as deliveryDate,asn.drop_order_time as dropOrderTime,asn.target_date as targetDate, asn.created_by as createdBy,asn.last_modified_by as lastModifiedBy,asn.flag as flag,flag.status as status from asn,mapper,flag /*left join mapper on asn.pnnumber = mapper.pnnumber, left join flag on asn.flag = flag.flag*/ where asn.pnnumber = mapper.pnnumber and asn.flag = flag.flag and asn.asnnumber = #{asnnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select mapper.ponumber,asn.id as id,asn.asnnumber as asnnumber,asn.pnnumber as pnnumber, asn.pn_quantity as pnQuantity,asn.payment as payment,asn.ship_to as shipTo,asn.sold_to as soldTo, asn.order_type as orderType,asn.exchange_provision_item as exchangeProvisionItem, asn.condition_item as conditionItem,asn.remark as remark,asn.carrier as carrier, asn.customer as customer,asn.net_due_date as netDueDate,asn.po_date as poDate, asn.delivery_date as deliveryDate,asn.drop_order_time as dropOrderTime,asn.target_date as targetDate, asn.created_by as createdBy,asn.last_modified_by as lastModifiedBy,asn.flag as flag,flag.status as status from asn,mapper,flag where asn.asnnumber = mapper.asnnumber and mapper.ponumber = #{ponumber} and asn.flag = flag.flag
mapper.insert: insert into asn (id, asnnumber, pnnumber, pn_quantity, payment, ship_to, sold_to, order_type, exchange_provision_item, condition_item, remark, carrier, customer, net_due_date, po_date, delivery_date, drop_order_time, target_date, created_by, last_modified_by, flag ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{asnnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pnnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pnQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{soldTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exchangeProvisionItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conditionItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netDueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{poDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dropOrderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{targetDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
